GR13malinivu:156: 2.27ab: tatra svarūpaṃ śaktiś ca sakalaś ceti tattrayam

GR13malinivu:194: 2.46ab: pracaye tatra saṃjñeyam ekaṃ tanmahati sthitam

GR13malinivu:365: 4.1cd: praṇamya krauñcahantāraṃ punar ūcur idaṃ vacaḥ

GR13malinivu:371: 4.4cd: yad vastu jñeyam ity uktaṃ heyatvādiprasiddhaye

GR13malinivu:390: 4.14ab: yā mayā kathitā devi bhinnayonis tu mālinī

GR13malinivu:426: 4.32ab: yato yogaṃ samāsādya yogī yogaphalaṃ labhet

GR13malinivu:462: 5.8ab: mṛgasaṃjñaś ca paśvākhyaḥ pañcamo 'nyaś ca mānuṣaḥ

GR13malinivu:508: 5.31ab: ambikā ca aghorā ca vāmadevī ca kīrtyate
GR13malinivu:510: 5.32ab: raudrī jyeṣṭhā ca vāmā ca tathā śaktisadāśivau
GR13malinivu:511: 5.32cd: etāni sakale pañca bhuvanāni vidur budhāḥ
GR13malinivu:513: 5.33cd: bhuvanānāṃ parijñeyaṃ saṅkṣepān na tu vistarāt
GR13malinivu:514: 5.34ab: śuddhenānena śuddhyanti sarvāṇy api na saṃśayaḥ
GR13malinivu:517: 5.35cd: bubhukṣoḥ sakalaṃ dhyātvā yogaṃ kurvīta yogavit
GR13malinivu:518: 5.36ab: ity eṣa kīrtito mārgo bhuvanākhyasya me mataḥ
GR13malinivu:524: 6.2cd: dharātattvaṃ ca gulphāntam abādīni tataḥ kramāt
GR13malinivu:532: 6.6cd: adhunā pañca tattvāni yathā dehe tathocyate
GR13malinivu:533: 6.7ab: nābher ūrdhvaṃ tu yāvat syāt parvaṣaṭkam anukramāt
GR13malinivu:537: 6.9ab: ākāśāntaṃ paraṃ śāntaṃ sarveṣāṃ vyāpakaṃ smaret
GR13malinivu:540: 6.10cd: vidyātattvam atordhvaṃ ca śivatattvaṃ tu pūrvavat
GR13malinivu:548: 6.14cd: catuṣkaṃ tu dvaye 'nyasminn ekam ekatra cintayet
GR13malinivu:550: 6.15cd: kāle pratyekam uddiṣṭam ekaikaṃ tu yathākramaṃ
GR13malinivu:554: 6.17cd: aṣṭakaṃ pañcakaṃ cānyad evam eva vilakṣayet
GR13malinivu:557: 6.19ab: teṣāṃ tanmantravad vyāptir yathedānīṃ tathā śṛṇu
GR13malinivu:558: 6.19cd: caturaṅgulam ādyaṃ tu dve cānye 'ṣṭāṅgule pṛthak
GR13malinivu:560: 6.20cd: caturbhir adhikaiś cānyad vyāpakaṃ navamaṃ mahat
GR13malinivu:562: 6.21cd: ekaikaṃ dvyaṅgulaṃ jñeyaṃ tatra pūrvaṃ padatrayam
GR13malinivu:564: 6.22cd: dvyaṅgule dve pade cānye ṣaḍaṅgulam ataḥ param
GR13malinivu:565: 6.23ab: dvādaśāṅgulam anyac ca dve 'nye pañcāṅgule pṛthak
GR13malinivu:567: 6.24ab: vyāpakaṃ padam anyac ca pūrvavat parikīrtitaṃ
GR13malinivu:568: 6.24cd: aparo 'yaṃ vidhiḥ proktaḥ parāparam ataḥ śṛṇu
GR13malinivu:571: 6.26ab: pradhānaṃ tryaṅgulaṃ jñeyaṃ śeṣaṃ pūrvavad ādiśet
GR13malinivu:572: 6.26cd: pare 'pi pūrvavat pṛthvī tryaṅgulāny aparāṇi ca
GR13malinivu:573: 6.27ab: catuṣparva pradhānaṃ ca śeṣaṃ pūrvavad āśrayet
GR13malinivu:574: 6.27cd: dvividho 'pi hi varṇānāṃ ṣaḍvidho bheda ucyate
GR13malinivu:580: iti śrīmālinīvijayottare tantre dehamārgādhikāraḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ samāptaḥ
GR13malinivu:584: 7.2ab: triśūlaṃ ca tathā padmaṃ śaktiś cakraṃ savajrakam
GR13malinivu:594: 7.7ab: prasṛte madhyame lagne kaumāryāḥ śaktir iṣyate
GR13malinivu:605: 7.12cd: vikṛte locane grīvā bhagnā jihvā prasāritā
GR13malinivu:607: 7.13cd: hastāv adhomukhau padbhyāṃ hṛdayāntaṃ nayed budhaḥ
GR13malinivu:608: 7.14ab: tiryag mukhāntam upari saṃmukhāv ūrdhvagau nayet
GR13malinivu:611: 7.15cd: baddhvā padmāsanaṃ yogī nābhāv akṣeśvaraṃ nyaset
GR13malinivu:612: 7.16ab: daṇḍākāraṃ tu taṃ tāvan nayed yāvat kakhatrayam
GR13malinivu:613: 7.16cd: nigṛhya tatra tat tūrṇaṃ prerayet khatrayeṇa tu
GR13malinivu:614: 7.17ab: etāṃ baddhvā mahāvīraḥ khe gatiṃ pratipadyate
GR13malinivu:617: 7.18cd: tarjanyā tatkaniṣṭhāṃ ca tarjanīṃ ca kaniṣṭhayā
GR13malinivu:621: 7.20cd: jihvāṃ ca lālayen mantrī hāhākāraṃ ca kārayet
GR13malinivu:624: 7.22ab: khaṭvāṅgākhyā smṛtā mudrā kapālam adhunā śṛṇu
GR13malinivu:626: 7.23ab: kapālam iti vijñeyam adhunā halam ucyate
GR13malinivu:631: 7.25cd: hale muṣṭir yathā vāmo dakṣahīnas tathāṅkuśaḥ
GR13malinivu:636: 7.28ab: madhyame dve yute kārye kaniṣṭhe puruṣāvadhi
GR13malinivu:638: 7.29ab: mudgaras triśikho hy eṣa kṣaṇād āveśakārakaḥ
GR13malinivu:648: 7.34ab: dakṣiṇe ca tathā vāmaṃ tarjanīmadhyame tathā
GR13malinivu:652: 7.36ab: evaṃ mudrāgaṇaṃ mantrī badhnīyad dhṛdaye budhaḥ
GR13malinivu:653: 7.36cd: sarvāsāṃ vācakāś cāsāṃ oṃ hrīṃ nāma tato namaḥ
GR13malinivu:654: iti śrīmālinīvijayottare tantre mudrādhikāro saptamaḥ samāptaḥ
GR13malinivu:665: 8.6ab: vidyāṅgaiḥ pañcabhiḥ paścāc chiraḥ prabhṛti guṇṭhayet
GR13malinivu:667: 8.7ab: tato 'vāsāḥ suvāsā ca hastau pādau ca dhāvayet
GR13malinivu:669: 8.8ab: nyāsaṃ kṛtvā tu sāmānyām aghamarṣaṃ dvitīyayā
GR13malinivu:670: 8.8cd: upasthānaṃ ca mālinyā japec caikākṣarāṃ parām
GR13malinivu:673: 8.10ab: vidhisnānādikaṃ cātra pūrvavat kiṃ tu vāriṇā
GR13malinivu:678: 8.12cd: tad eva punar āgacched anusmṛtya parāparām
GR13malinivu:680: 8.13cd: kiṃ tu tatra parāṃ mantrī sravantīm amṛtaṃ smaret
GR13malinivu:683: 8.15ab: sūryādau mantram ādāya gacched astram anusmaran
GR13malinivu:687: 8.17ab: daśasv api tato 'streṇa dikṣu saṃkalpya rakṣaṇaṃ
GR13malinivu:694: 8.20cd: tato 'sya yojayec chaktiṃ so 'ham ity aparājitaḥ
GR13malinivu:697: 8.22ab: nitambaṃ tadadhastāc ca vāmastanam adhaḥ punaḥ
GR13malinivu:700: 8.23cd: eṣa piṇḍakaro devi navātmaka iti śrutaḥ
GR13malinivu:702: 8.24cd: eṣa tryarṇojjhito .adhastād dīrghaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ svarair yutaḥ
GR13malinivu:707: 8.27ab: a lalāṭe dvitīyaṃ ca vaktre saṃparikalpayet
GR13malinivu:708: 8.27cd: i ī netradvaye dattvā u ū karṇadvaye nyaset
GR13malinivu:709: 8.28ab: ṛ .R nāsāpuṭe tadvad ḷ .L gaṇḍadvaye tathā
GR13malinivu:713: 8.30ab: kavargaṃ vinyased vāme tadvac cādyam anukramāt
GR13malinivu:715: 8.31ab: pādyaṃ pārśvadvaye pṛṣṭhe jaṭhare hṛdy anukramāt
GR13malinivu:718: 8.32cd: mūrtyaṅgāni tato dattvā śivam āvāhayed budhaḥ
GR13malinivu:721: 8.34ab: sadbhāvaḥ paramo hy eṣaḥ bhairavasya mahātmanaḥ
GR13malinivu:723: 8.35ab: mūrtiḥ sṛṣṭis tritattvaṃ ca aṣṭau mūrtyaṅgasaṃyutāḥ
GR13malinivu:724: 8.35cd: śivaḥ sāṅgaś ca ṣoḍhaiva nyāsaḥ saṃparikīrtitaḥ
GR13malinivu:725: 8.36ab: asyopari tataḥ śāktaṃ kuryān nyāsaṃ yathā śṛṇu
GR13malinivu:726: 8.36cd: mūrtau parāparāṃ nyasya tadvaktrāṇi ca mālinīm
GR13malinivu:734: 8.40cd: anena prīṇitāḥ sarvā dadate vāñchitaṃ phalam
GR13malinivu:735: 8.41ab: sadbhāvaḥ paramo hy eṣa mātṛṇāṃ paripaṭhyate
GR13malinivu:736: 8.41cd: tasmād enāṃ japen mantrī ya icchet siddhim uttamām
GR13malinivu:739: 8.43ab: yāvatyaḥ siddhayas tantre sarvāḥ syur anayā kṛtāḥ
GR13malinivu:741: 8.44ab: mūrtiḥ savaktrā śaktiś ca vidyātritaya eva ca
GR13malinivu:743: 8.45ab: sāṅgāś caiva parā śaktir nyāsaḥ prokto .atha ṣaḍvidhaḥ
GR13malinivu:748: 8.47cd: tāvatsv apy evam evāyaṃ nyāsaḥ pañcavidho mataḥ
GR13malinivu:749: 8.48ab: kiṃ tu bāhyas tu yo yatra sa tatrāṅgasamanvitaḥ
GR13malinivu:750: 8.48cd: ṣaṣṭhaḥ syād iti sarvatra ṣoḍhaivāyam udāhṛtaḥ
GR13malinivu:755: 8.51ab: kartavyā yasya saṃśuddhir anyasyāpy atra vastunaḥ
GR13malinivu:757: 8.52ab: na cāsaṃśodhitaṃ vastu kiñcid apy atra kalpayet
GR13malinivu:758: 8.52cd: tena śuddhaṃ tu sarvaṃ yad aśuddham api tac chuci
GR13malinivu:759: 8.53ab: tad ambunā samāpūrya ṣaḍbhir aṅgaiḥ samarpya ca
GR13malinivu:761: 8.54ab: ātmānaṃ pūjayitvā tu kuryād antaḥkṛtiṃ yathā
GR13malinivu:764: 8.55cd: dharāṃ surodaṃ potaṃ ca kandaś ceti catuṣṭayam
GR13malinivu:766: 8.56cd: tato nālam anantākhyaṃ daṇḍam asya prakalpayet
GR13malinivu:769: 8.58ab: na sa yogam avāpnoti śivena saha mānavaḥ
GR13malinivu:770: 8.58cd: dharmaṃ jñānaṃ ca vairāgyam aiśvaryaṃ ca catuṣṭayam
GR13malinivu:772: 8.59cd: gātrakāṇāṃ catuṣkaṃ ca dikṣu pūrvādiṣu smaret
GR13malinivu:779: 8.63ab: vāmā jyeṣṭhā ca raudrī ca kālī ceti tathā parā
GR13malinivu:784: 8.65cd: vibhur jñānī kriyā cecchā vāgīśī jvālinī tathā
GR13malinivu:785: 8.66ab: vāmā jyeṣṭhā ca raudrī ca sarvāḥ kālānalaprabhāḥ
GR13malinivu:793: 8.70ab: cintayet tasya śṛṅgeṣu śāktaṃ padmatrayaṃ tataḥ
GR13malinivu:796: 8.71cd: ātmākhyāṃ ca tatas tasyāṃ pūrvanyāsaṃ śivātmakam
GR13malinivu:797: 8.72ab: tato madhye parāṃ śaktiṃ dakṣiṇottarayor dvayam
GR13malinivu:799: 8.73ab: icchārūpadharāṃ dhyātvā kiṃ cid ugrāṃ na bhīṣaṇām
GR13malinivu:803: 8.75ab: ṣaḍvidhe 'pi kṛte śākte mūrtyādāv api cintayet
GR13malinivu:807: 8.77ab: kiṃ tu śakrādidikṣv astramantraṃ madhye ca locanam
GR13malinivu:810: 8.78cd: sāstrān svamantraiḥ saṃcintya japaṃ paścāt samārabhet
GR13malinivu:811: 8.79ab: svarūpe tallayo bhūtvā ekaikāṃ daśadhā smaret
GR13malinivu:814: 8.80cd: ity eva mānaso yāgaḥ kathitaḥ sāmudāyikaḥ
GR13malinivu:818: 8.82cd: ity etac chāmbhavaṃ proktam aṣṭāntaṃ śāktam iṣyate
GR13malinivu:819: 8.83ab: turyāntam āṇavaṃ vidyād iti śūlatrayaṃ matam
GR13malinivu:821: 8.84ab: tenāpi khecarīṃ baddhvā tyajaty evaṃ mahītalam
GR13malinivu:824: 8.85cd: nirvighnaṃ tad gṛhaṃ dhyātvā saṃhṛtyeśadiśaṃ nayet
GR13malinivu:825: 8.86ab: pañcagavyaṃ tataḥ kuryād vadanaiḥ pañcabhir budhaḥ
GR13malinivu:826: 8.86cd: gomūtraṃ gomayaṃ caiva kṣīraṃ dadhi ghṛtaṃ tathā
GR13malinivu:828: 8.87cd: mudre dravyāmṛtaṃ baddhvā tattvaṃ tasya vicintayet
GR13malinivu:835: 8.91ab: gām ity anena vighneśaṃ gandhapuṣpādibhir yajet
GR13malinivu:839: 8.93ab: dattvānantaṃ tathā dharmaṃ jñānaṃ vairāgyam eva ca
GR13malinivu:840: 8.93cd: aiśvaryaṃ karṇikāṃ ceti ṣaḍuttham idam āsanam
GR13malinivu:845: 8.96ab: tadrūpam eva saṃcintya tato mātraṣṭakaṃ yajet
GR13malinivu:846: 8.96cd: indrāṇīṃ pūrvapatre tu savajrāṃ yugapat smaret
GR13malinivu:847: 8.97ab: āgneyiṃ śaktihastāṃ tu yāmyāṃ daṇḍakarāṃ tataḥ
GR13malinivu:848: 8.97cd: nairṛtīṃ varuṇānīṃ ca vāyavīṃ ca vicakṣaṇaḥ
GR13malinivu:853: 8.100ab: sahasraṃ homayet tatra tato japtvā visarjayet
GR13malinivu:854: 8.100cd: śatam aṣṭottaraṃ pūrṇaṃ paścād yajanam ārabhet
GR13malinivu:860: 8.103cd: vārdhāny api tathābhūtā kiṃ tu sāstreṇa pūjitā
GR13malinivu:861: 8.104ab: vikirair āsanaṃ dattvā pūrvoktaṃ tu vicakṣaṇaḥ
GR13malinivu:864: 8.105cd: bhrāmayet kalaśaṃ paścād brūyal lokeśvarān idam
GR13malinivu:865: 8.106ab: bho bhoḥ śakra tvayā svasyāṃ diśi vighnapraśāntaye
GR13malinivu:867: 8.107ab: nītvā tatrāsane pūrvaṃ mūrtibhūtaṃ ghaṭaṃ nyaset
GR13malinivu:872: 8.109cd: tatra saṃpūjayet ṣaṭkaṃ trikaṃ vāpy ekam eva vā
GR13malinivu:876: 8.111cd: sarvam astreṇa kūrvīta vidyām oṃ hrīm iti nyaset
GR13malinivu:877: 8.112ab: śivam om iti vinyasya saṃpūjya dvitayaṃ punaḥ
GR13malinivu:880: 8.113cd: tatas tv āhūtayaḥ pañca vidyāṅgair eva homayet
GR13malinivu:881: 8.114ab: jananādi tataḥ karma sarvam evaṃkṛte kṛtam
GR13malinivu:883: 8.115ab: saṃpūjya mātaraṃ vahneḥ pitaraṃ ca visarjayet
GR13malinivu:886: 8.116cd: ākṛṣya hṛdi saṃkumbhya dakṣiṇena punaḥ kṣipet
GR13malinivu:887: 8.117ab: pūrṇāṃ ca pūrvavad dadyāc chivāgner aparo vidhiḥ
GR13malinivu:889: 8.118ab: kuryād antaḥkṛtiṃ mantrī tato homaṃ samārabhet
GR13malinivu:894: 8.120cd: pañcagavyaṃ caruṃ dadyād dantadhāvanam eva ca
GR13malinivu:901: 8.124ab: bahiḥkarma tataḥ kuryād dikṣu sarvāsu daiśikaḥ
GR13malinivu:902: 8.124cd: oṃ kṣaḥ kṣaḥ sarvabhūtebhyaḥ svāheti manunāmunā
GR13malinivu:905: 8.126ab: nyāsaṃ kṛtvā tu śiṣyāṇām ātmanaś ca viśeṣataḥ
GR13malinivu:907: 8.127ab: śubhaṃ prakāśayet teṣāṃ aśubhe homam ācaret
GR13malinivu:912: 8.129cd: evaṃvidhaṃ śubhaṃ dṛṣṭvā siddhiṃ prāpnoty abhīpsitām
GR13malinivu:917: 8.132ab: eteṣām anivedyaiva na kiṃ cid api bhakṣayet
GR13malinivu:919: 8.133ab: niṣphalaṃ naiva ceṣṭeta muhūrtam api mantravit
GR13malinivu:922: 8.134cd: devadevaṃ tataḥ snānaṃ śiṣyāṇām ātmano 'pi vā
GR13malinivu:924: 8.135cd: ity etat sāmayaṃ karma samāsāt parikīrtitam
GR13malinivu:927: 9.1ab: athaiṣāṃ samayasthānāṃ kuryād dīkṣāṃ yada guruḥ
GR13malinivu:929: 9.2ab: sa ca pūrvaṃ diśaṃ samyak sūtram āsphālayet tataḥ
GR13malinivu:932: 9.3cd: aṅkayed aparād aṅkād pūrvād api tathaiva te
GR13malinivu:937: 9.6ab: vedāśrite hi haste prāk pūrvam ardhaṃ vibhājayet
GR13malinivu:941: 9.8ab: dvau dvau bhāgau parityajya punar dakṣiṇasaumyagau
GR13malinivu:942: 9.8cd: brahmaṇaḥ pārśvayor jīvāc caturthāt pūrvatas tathā
GR13malinivu:950: 9.12cd: dve rekhe pūrvage neye bhāgatryaṃśaśame budhaiḥ
GR13malinivu:959: 9.17ab: śeṣam anyad bhaved dṛśyaṃ pṛthutvād bhāgasaṃmitam
GR13malinivu:961: 9.18ab: vedāṅgulaṃ ca tadadho mūlaṃ tīkṣṇāgram iṣyate
GR13malinivu:963: 9.19ab: hastāyāmaṃ tadardhaṃ tu vistarād api atasamam
GR13malinivu:964: 9.19cd: dviguṇaṃ bāhyataḥ kuryāt tataḥ padmaṃ yathā śṛṇu
GR13malinivu:966: 9.20cd: dikṣv aṣṭau punar apy aṣṭau jīvasūtrāṇi ṣoḍaśa
GR13malinivu:967: 9.21ab: dvayor dvayoḥ punar madhye tatsaṃkhyātāni pātayet
GR13malinivu:969: 9.22ab: etad antaṃ prakurvīta tato jīvāgram ānayet
GR13malinivu:970: 9.22cd: yatraiva kutra cit saṅgas tatsaṃbandhe sthirīkṛte
GR13malinivu:971: 9.23ab: tatra kṛtvā nayen mantrī patrāgrāṇāṃ prasiddhaye
GR13malinivu:972: 9.23cd: ekaikasmin dale kuryāt kesarāṇāṃ trayaṃ trayam
GR13malinivu:975: 9.25ab: raktaiḥ kṛṣṇais tathāpītair haritaiś ca viśeṣataḥ
GR13malinivu:977: 9.26ab: sitaṃ raktaṃ tathā pītaṃ kāryaṃ kesarajālakam
GR13malinivu:981: 9.28ab: caturbhir api śṛṅgāṇi tribhir maṇḍalam iṣyate
GR13malinivu:983: 9.29ab: raktaṃ śūlaṃ prakurvīta yat tat pūrvaṃ prakalpitam
GR13malinivu:985: 9.30ab: dvāraṃ vedāśri vṛttaṃ vā saṃkīrṇaṃ vā vicitritam
GR13malinivu:991: 9.33ab: praviśya pūrvavan mantrī upaviśya yathā purā
GR13malinivu:997: 9.36ab: śāktaṃ ca pūrvavat kṛtvā tarpayet pūrvavad budhaḥ
GR13malinivu:998: 9.36cd: punar abhyarcya deveśaṃ bhaktyā vijñāpayed idam
GR13malinivu:1001: 9.38ab: tad ete tadvidhāḥ prāptās tvam eṣāṃ kurv anugraham
GR13malinivu:1002: 9.38cd: madīyāṃ tanum āviśya yenāhaṃ tvat samo bhavan
GR13malinivu:1003: 9.39ab: karomy evam iti prokto harṣād utphullalocanaḥ
GR13malinivu:1008: 9.41cd: karaṇatvaṃ prayānty asya mantrā ye hṛdayādayaḥ
GR13malinivu:1014: 9.44cd: prakṣālya gandhatoyena hastaṃ hastena kena cit
GR13malinivu:1016: 9.45cd: ātmany ālabhanaṃ kuryād grahaṇaṃ yojanaṃ tathā
GR13malinivu:1017: 9.46ab: viyogaṃ ca tathoddhāraṃ pāśacchedādikaṃ ca yat
GR13malinivu:1022: 9.48cd: ā yāgāntam ahaṃ kumbhe saṃsthito vighnaśāntaye
GR13malinivu:1025: 9.50ab: ity etat sarvam ālocya śodhyādhvānaṃ vicintayet
GR13malinivu:1026: 9.50cd: dīkṣāṃ yenādhvanā mantrī śiṣyāṇāṃ kartum icchati
GR13malinivu:1029: 9.52ab: aham eva paraṃ tattvaṃ mayi sarvam idaṃ jagat
GR13malinivu:1030: 9.52cd: adhiṣṭhātā ca kartā ca sarvasyāham avasthitaḥ
GR13malinivu:1031: 9.53ab: tatsamatvaṃ gato jantur mukta ity abhidhīyate
GR13malinivu:1032: 9.53cd: evaṃ saṃcintya bhūyo 'pi śodhyam ādyaṃ samāśrayet
GR13malinivu:1034: 9.54cd: śodhyādhvānaṃ tu śiṣyāṇāṃ nyasya dehe puroktavat
GR13malinivu:1039: 9.56cd: svamantreṇa tatas tattvam āvāhyeṣṭvā pratarpya ca
GR13malinivu:1041: 9.57cd: māyānte 'dhvani tām eva śuddhe vidyāṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ
GR13malinivu:1042: 9.58ab: tasyāṃ saṃtarpaṇaṃ kṛtvā śiṣyam astreṇa tāḍayet
GR13malinivu:1043: 9.58cd: ālabhya hṛdaye vidvāñ chivahastena taṃ punaḥ
GR13malinivu:1051: 9.62cd: samyag āhutayo dadyād daśa pañca vicakṣaṇaḥ
GR13malinivu:1059: 9.66cd: dadyād ekaikaśo dhyātvā āhutīnāṃ trayaṃ trayam
GR13malinivu:1061: 9.67cd: śiśum utkṣipya cātmasthaṃ taddehasthaṃ ca kārayet
GR13malinivu:1062: 9.68ab: āhutīnāṃ trayaṃ dadyād dattvā pūrṇāhutiṃ budhaḥ
GR13malinivu:1067: 9.70cd: bāhupāśaṃ tu taṃ chittvā homayed ājyasaṃyutam
GR13malinivu:1068: 9.71ab: māyātattve viśudhe tu kaṇṭhapāśe tathā budhaḥ
GR13malinivu:1073: 9.73cd: na cāpi sakalād ūrdhvam aṅgaṣaṭkaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ
GR13malinivu:1074: 9.74ab: niṣkale parayā kāryaṃ yat kiṃ cid vidhicoditam
GR13malinivu:1075: 9.74cd: viśuddhe sakalānte tu śikhāṃ chittvā vicakṣaṇaḥ
GR13malinivu:1076: 9.75ab: hutvā cājyaṃ tataḥ śiṣyaṃ snāpayed anupūrvataḥ
GR13malinivu:1082: 9.78ab: tiṣṭhet tāvad anudvigno yāvad ājyakṣayo bhavet
GR13malinivu:1083: 9.78cd: evaṃ yukte pare tattve guruṇa śivamūrtinā
GR13malinivu:1089: 9.81cd: aṣṭadhā mantramārge 'pi kalākhye 'pi ca tad dvidhā
GR13malinivu:1093: iti śrīmālinīvijayottare tantre kriyādīkṣādhikāro navamaḥ samāptaḥ
GR13malinivu:1096: 10.1cd: śāstrajñaṃ saṃyataṃ dhīram alubdham aśaṭhaṃ dṛḍham
GR13malinivu:1108: 10.7cd: sadāśivasamaṃ dhyātvā tatas tam api bhūṣayet
GR13malinivu:1109: 10.8ab: punaḥ saṃpūjya deveśaṃ mantram asmai daded budhaḥ
GR13malinivu:1111: 10.9ab: so 'pi mūrdhani taṃ tadvan mūrtim āśritya dakṣiṇam
GR13malinivu:1117: 10.12ab: evam etat padaṃ prāpyaṃ duṣprāpyam akṛtātmanām
GR13malinivu:1120: 10.13cd: lakṣam ekaṃ daśāṃśena tasya tarpaṇam ācaret
GR13malinivu:1121: 10.14ab: pūrvavac cābhiṣekaṃ ca kṛtvā brahmaśiro japet
GR13malinivu:1123: 10.15ab: lakṣadvayaṃ ca rudrāṇīṃ catuṣkaṃ tu puruṣṭutam
GR13malinivu:1126: 10.16cd: tataḥ saṃrakṣito mantrair ebhir apratimo bhavet
GR13malinivu:1128: 10.17cd: evaṃ cīrṇavrato bhūtvā yaṃ sādhayitum icchati
GR13malinivu:1129: 10.18ab: dattvārghaṃ tasya lakṣāṇāṃ japen navakam ādarāt
GR13malinivu:1132: 10.19cd: madhyame dviguṇaṃ kṛtvā triguṇaṃ kanyase 'pi ca
GR13malinivu:1137: 10.22ab: pūrvam evam imaṃ kṛtvā siddher arghaṃ daded budhaḥ
GR13malinivu:1138: 10.22cd: dattvārghaṃ tu japet tāvad yāvat siddhir abhīpsitā
GR13malinivu:1140: 10.23cd: vaśam ānīyate devi dvābhyāṃ rājyam avāpnuyāt
GR13malinivu:1142: 10.24cd: pañcabhir medinī sarvā ṣaḍbhir apsarasāṃ gaṇaḥ
GR13malinivu:1143: 10.25ab: saptabhiḥ sapta lokāś ca daśabhis tatsamo bhavet
GR13malinivu:1147: 10.27ab: athavā vīracittaḥ syāt kṛtvā sevāṃ yathoditām
GR13malinivu:1149: 10.28ab: kṛtvā pūrvoditaṃ yāgaṃ hutvā dravyam athottaram
GR13malinivu:1154: 10.30cd: tāsāṃ kṛtvā namaskāraṃ bhittvā vāmāṅgam ātmanaḥ
GR13malinivu:1155: 10.31ab: tadutthena tatas tāsāṃ dattvārghaṃ tatsamo bhavet
GR13malinivu:1156: 10.31cd: ācāryo 'pi ca ṣaṇmāsaṃ maunī pratidinaṃ caret
GR13malinivu:1157: 10.32ab: daśa pañca ca ye mantrāḥ pūrvam uktā mayā tava
GR13malinivu:1161: 10.34ab: abhiṣiñcet tadātmānam ādāv ante ca daiśikaḥ
GR13malinivu:1162: 10.34cd: evaṃ cīrṇavrato bhūtvā mantrī mantravid uttamaḥ
GR13malinivu:1165: 10.36ab: vāmāṅguṣṭhe tule netre tarjanyām astram eva ca
GR13malinivu:1169: 10.38ab: svasthāneṣu tathāṅgāni nyāsaḥ sāmānya ity ayam
GR13malinivu:1174: 11.2ab: nāsyāṃ maṇḍalakuṇādi kiṃ cid apy upayujyate
GR13malinivu:1175: 11.2cd: na ca nyāsādikaṃ pūrvaṃ snānādi ca yathecchayā
GR13malinivu:1185: 11.7cd: yojayet vidhānajñaḥ parāṃ vā kevalāṃ priye
GR13malinivu:1190: 11.10ab: antyādhaḥ pūjayed vidyāṃ tadvad vidyāṃ maheśvarīm
GR13malinivu:1200: 11.15ab: asyāpy uccāraṇād eva saṃvittiḥ syāt paroditā
GR13malinivu:1208: 11.19ab: nirālambau tu tau dhyātvā śaktyākṛṣṭau vicintayet
GR13malinivu:1210: 11.20ab: tataḥ prakṣepayet puṣpaṃ sā śaktis tatkarasthitā
GR13malinivu:1211: 11.20cd: yatra tat patate puṣpaṃ tatkulaṃ tasya lakṣayet
GR13malinivu:1212: 11.21ab: mukham udghāṭya taṃ paścāt pādayoḥ pratipātayet
GR13malinivu:1213: 11.21cd: tato 'sya mastake cakraṃ hastayoś cārcya yogavit
GR13malinivu:1214: 11.22ab: taddhastau prerayec chaktyā yāvan mūrdhāntam āgatau
GR13malinivu:1217: 11.23cd: śaktyālambāṃ tanuṃ kṛtvā sthāpayed agrataḥ śiśoḥ
GR13malinivu:1225: 11.27cd: ity ayaṃ samayī proktaḥ saṃsthitoktena vartmanā
GR13malinivu:1227: 11.28cd: tad iṣṭvā pūrvavad yogī kuleśaṃ tam anukramāt
GR13malinivu:1232: 11.31ab: upaviśya tatas tasya vidhānam idam ācaret
GR13malinivu:1236: 11.33ab: śive saṃcintayel līnāṃ niṣkale sakale 'pi vā
GR13malinivu:1241: 11.35cd: ānanda udbhavaḥ kampo nidrā ghūrṇiś ca pañcamī
GR13malinivu:1245: 11.37cd: athavā kasya cin nāyam āveśaḥ saṃprajāyate
GR13malinivu:1246: 11.38ab: tad enaṃ yugapac chaktyā sabāhyābhyantare dahet
GR13malinivu:1248: 11.39ab: patate kāśyapīpṛṣṭhe ākṣepaṃ vā karoty asau
GR13malinivu:1249: 11.39cd: yasya tv evam api syān na taṃ caivopalavat tyajet
GR13malinivu:1255: 11.42cd: tatreṣṭvā pūrvavad dehaṃ vistīrṇair vibudhair budhaiḥ [?]
GR13malinivu:1263: 11.46cd: viditau bhavatas tatra gurur mokṣaprado bhavet
GR13malinivu:1264: 11.47ab: anayoḥ kathayej jñānaṃ trividhaṃ sarvam apy alam
GR13malinivu:1266: iti śrīmālinīvijayottare tantre dīkṣādhikāra ekādaśaḥ samāptaḥ
GR13malinivu:1272: 12.3ab: pūrvam eva tvayā proktaṃ yogī yogaṃ samabhyaset
GR13malinivu:1287: 12.10cd: trividhaṃ kīrtitaṃ vyoma daśadhā bindur iṣyate
GR13malinivu:1291: 12.12cd: vigrahaḥ svāṇubhedāc ca dvidhā bhinno 'py anekadhā
GR13malinivu:1292: 12.13ab: bhuvanānāṃ na saṅkhyāsti varṇānāṃ sā śatārdhikā
GR13malinivu:1293: 12.13cd: ekasminn api sādhye vai lakṣed atrānuṣaṅgataḥ
GR13malinivu:1294: 12.14ab: anyāny api phalāni syur lakṣyabhedaḥ sa ucyate
GR13malinivu:1295: 12.14cd: ekam eva phalaṃ yatra cittabhedas tv asau mataḥ
GR13malinivu:1297: 12.15cd: yaṃ siṣādhayiṣur yogam ādāv eva samācaret
GR13malinivu:1298: 12.16ab: hastayos tu parābījaṃ nyasya śaktim anusmaret
GR13malinivu:1301: 12.17cd: namaskāraṃ tataḥ paścād baddhvā hṛdi dhṛtānilaḥ
GR13malinivu:1306: 12.20ab: evam āviṣṭadehas tu yathoktaṃ vidhim ācaret
GR13malinivu:1310: 12.22ab: samyag āviṣṭadehaḥ syād iti dhyāyed ananyadhīḥ
GR13malinivu:1313: 12.23cd: divasāt saptamād ūrdhvaṃ jaḍatā cāsya jāyate
GR13malinivu:1316: 12.25ab: eṣā te pārthivī śuddhā dhāraṇā parikīrtitā
GR13malinivu:1321: 12.27cd: ṣaḍbhir māsair dharāntaḥsthaṃ sarvaṃ jānāti tattvataḥ
GR13malinivu:1323: 12.28cd: dvitīyaḥ kathito bhedas tṛtīyam adhunā śṛṇu
GR13malinivu:1324: 12.29ab: tadvad eva smared dehaṃ kiṃ tu vyāpāravarjitam
GR13malinivu:1329: 12.31cd: tad eva sthiram āpnoti nirvyāpāre tu pañcame
GR13malinivu:1332: 12.33ab: dvaye 'py atra sthirībhūte bhūr bhuvaḥ svar iti trayam
GR13malinivu:1333: 12.33cd: vetti bhuṅkte ca lokānāṃ puroktair eva vatsaraiḥ
GR13malinivu:1337: 12.35cd: vetti bhuṅkte sthirībhūte bhede 'smin navame budhaḥ
GR13malinivu:1348: 12.41ab: yo yatra yojitas tattve sa tasmān na nivartate
GR13malinivu:1357: 13.2ab: jalāntaḥsthaṃ smared dehaṃ sitaṃ śītaṃ suvartulam
GR13malinivu:1359: 13.3ab: evam abhyasyatas tasya saptāhāt klinnatā bhavet
GR13malinivu:1362: 13.4cd: bhavaty abdena yogīndras tribhir varṣati meghavat
GR13malinivu:1363: 13.5ab: ity eṣā vāruṇī proktā prathamā śuddhadhāraṇā
GR13malinivu:1364: 13.5cd: adhunā saṃpravakṣyāmi bhedair bhinnām imāṃ punaḥ
GR13malinivu:1365: 13.6ab: pūrvavac cintayed dehaṃ savyāpāraṃ sitaṃ svakam
GR13malinivu:1368: 13.7cd: ṣaṇmāsāj jāyate sthairyaṃ yadi tanmayatāṃ gataḥ
GR13malinivu:1371: 13.9ab: sa yāti vāruṇaṃ tattvaṃ bhūmikāḥ kramaśo 'bhyaset
GR13malinivu:1374: 13.10cd: taddṛṣṭiḥ sthiratām eti svarūpe pañcame sthire
GR13malinivu:1378: 13.12cd: tad eva sthiratām eti tatra susthiratāṃ gate
GR13malinivu:1388: 13.17cd: ṣaṭke sarveśatām eti dvitaye 'nyatra tu cyutiḥ
GR13malinivu:1391: 13.19ab: tat phalāntaram etasmād uktaṃ yac cāpi vakṣyate
GR13malinivu:1400: 13.23cd: icchayā nirdahed yad yat spṛṣṭaṃ vastu ṛtukṣayāt
GR13malinivu:1401: 13.24ab: tryabdād agnisamo bhūtvā krīḍaty agnir yathecchayā
GR13malinivu:1405: 13.26ab: saptāhād vyādhibhir hīnaḥ ṣaṇmāsād agnivad bhavet
GR13malinivu:1406: 13.26cd: tribhir abdaiḥ sa saṃpūrṇaṃ tejastattvaṃ prapaśyati
GR13malinivu:1407: 13.27ab: yacchaktibhede yad dṛṣṭaṃ tat tadbhede sthirībhavet
GR13malinivu:1409: 13.28ab: dhyāyan prapaśyate tejas tattveśān akhilān kramāt
GR13malinivu:1419: 13.33ab: tasmān na cyavate sthānād āsaṃhāram akhaṇḍitaḥ
GR13malinivu:1420: 13.33cd: saṃhāre tu paraṃ śāntaṃ padam abhyeti śāṅkaram
GR13malinivu:1423: 13.35ab: calaṃ sacūcūśabdaṃ ca vāyavīṃ dhāraṇāṃ śritaḥ
GR13malinivu:1426: 13.36cd: yojanānāṃ śataṃ gatvā muhūrtād ety akhedataḥ
GR13malinivu:1427: 13.37ab: vatsarais tu tribhiḥ sākṣād vāyurūpadharo bhavet
GR13malinivu:1431: 13.39ab: pūrvoktaṃ sarvam āpnoti ṣaṇmāsān nātra saṃśayaḥ
GR13malinivu:1432: 13.39cd: tryabdāt prapaśyate vāyu tattvaṃ tanmayatāṃ gataḥ
GR13malinivu:1436: 13.41cd: dhyāyaṃs tatsamatām eti tatsaṃlīno yadā bhavet
GR13malinivu:1444: 13.45cd: māsamātreṇa bhogīndrair api daṣṭo na muhyati
GR13malinivu:1449: 13.48ab: acchedyaś cāpy abhedyaś ca cchidrāṃ paśyati medinīm
GR13malinivu:1452: 13.49cd: pūrvoktaṃ ca phalaṃ sarvaṃ saptāhādikam āpnuyāt
GR13malinivu:1454: 13.50cd: tattattveśān kramāt sarvān prapaśyaty agrataḥ sthitān
GR13malinivu:1461: 13.54ab: svatantratvam anuprāpya na kva cit pratihanyate
GR13malinivu:1464: 13.55cd: tāsv eva saṃdadhac cittaṃ viṣādikṣaya ātmanaḥ
GR13malinivu:1465: 13.56ab: anyasyām api saṃvittau yasyām eva nijecchayā
GR13malinivu:1466: 13.56cd: cetaḥ samyak sthirīkuryāt tayā tatphalam aśnute
GR13malinivu:1468: 13.57cd: antarāyatvam abhyeti tatra kuryān na saṃsthitim
GR13malinivu:1469: 13.58ab: saṃsthitiṃ tatra kurvanto na prāpsyanty uttamaṃ phalam
GR13malinivu:1471: 13.59ab: aindrāntāḥ pañca siddhyanti yogināṃ bhedato 'pi vā
GR13malinivu:1473: 13.60ab: tryabdād ādyāṃ prasādhyānyāṃ dvābhyām ekena cāparām
GR13malinivu:1474: 13.60cd: ṣaṇmāsāt pañcabhiś cānyāṃ caturbhis tribhir eva ca
GR13malinivu:1475: 13.61ab: dvābhyām ekena pakṣeṇa daśabhiḥ pañcabhir dinaiḥ
GR13malinivu:1476: 13.61cd: tribhir dvābhyām athaikena vyastecchoḥ pūrvavat kramaḥ
GR13malinivu:1477: 13.62ab: śāśvataṃ padam āpnoti bhuktvā siddhiṃ yathepsitām
GR13malinivu:1478: iti śrīmālinīvijayottare tantre bhūtajayādhikāras trayodaśaḥ samāptaḥ
GR13malinivu:1487: 14.4cd: ṣaḍbhir māsaiḥ svayaṃ gandha maya eva bhaviṣyati
GR13malinivu:1488: 14.5ab: yo yatra rocate gandhas taṃ tatra kurute bhṛśam
GR13malinivu:1490: 14.6ab: tadūrdhvam ātmano rūpaṃ tatra saṃcintayed yadi
GR13malinivu:1507: 14.14cd: tadā tan nigiran yogī ṣaṇmāsān mṛtyujid bhavet
GR13malinivu:1509: 14.15cd: jīved ācandratārārkam abhyasyaṃś ca kva cit kva cit
GR13malinivu:1519: 14.20cd: śaratsaṃdhyābhrasaṃkāśaṃ yat tat kiṃ cit prapaśyati
GR13malinivu:1520: 14.21ab: tatra cetaḥ samādhāya yāvad āste daśāhnikam
GR13malinivu:1521: 14.21cd: tāvat sa paśyate tatra bindūn sūkṣmatamān api
GR13malinivu:1522: 14.22ab: ke cit tatra sitā raktāḥ pītā nīlās tathāpare
GR13malinivu:1523: 14.22cd: tān dṛṣṭvā teṣu saṃdadhyān mano 'tyantam ananyadhīḥ
GR13malinivu:1524: 14.23ab: ṣaṇmāsāt paśyate teṣu rūpāṇi subahūni ca
GR13malinivu:1525: 14.23cd: tryabdāt tāny eva tejobhiḥ pradīptāni sthirāṇi ca
GR13malinivu:1526: 14.24ab: tāny abhyasyaṃs tato dvyabdād bimbākārāṇi paśyati
GR13malinivu:1528: 14.25ab: trimāsād vyāpakaṃ tejo māsāt sarvaṃ visarpitam
GR13malinivu:1530: 14.26ab: sarvaṃ phalam avāpnoti divyadṛṣṭiś ca jāyate
GR13malinivu:1533: 14.27cd: ato 'syāṃ niścayaṃ kuryāt kim anyaiḥ śāstraḍambaraiḥ
GR13malinivu:1535: 14.28cd: dhāraṇāṃ tu yayā yogī vajradehaḥ prajāyate
GR13malinivu:1538: 14.30ab: tato 'sya daśabhir devi divasais tvaci sarvataḥ
GR13malinivu:1547: 14.34cd: dīpyate jāṭharo vahnis tato 'sya daśabhir dinaiḥ
GR13malinivu:1549: 14.35cd: yas tasyānte dhvanir mandaḥ kiṃ cit kiṃ cid vibhāvyate
GR13malinivu:1552: 14.37ab: yaḥ punaḥ śrūyate śabdas tadante śaṅkhanādavat
GR13malinivu:1557: 14.39cd: sa mantra iti vijñeyo yogibhir yogakāṅkṣibhiḥ
GR13malinivu:1561: 14.41cd: mantreśeśapadaṃ tad dhi siddhīnāṃ kāraṇaṃ mahat
GR13malinivu:1563: 14.42cd: tādṛśo yo dhvanis tatra taṃ vidyāc chāmbhavaṃ padaṃ
GR13malinivu:1564: 14.43ab: pṛthag vā kramaśo vāpi sarvān etān samabhyaset
GR13malinivu:1566: 14.44ab: ity etāḥ kathitāḥ pañca tanmātrāṇāṃ tu dhāraṇāḥ
GR13malinivu:1577: 15.4cd: tribhir abdaiḥ svayaṃ kartā śāstrāṇāṃ saṃprajāyate
GR13malinivu:1583: 15.7cd: vastu gṛhṇāty asaṃdehāt tryabdāt pāre 'pi vāridheḥ
GR13malinivu:1603: 15.17cd: vatsarais tu tribhiḥ sākṣāl leḍhy asau paramāmṛtam
GR13malinivu:1606: 15.19ab: pūrvavat sarvam anyac ca svadehādy anucintayan
GR13malinivu:1611: 15.21cd: ghātayed gandham āghrāya yasya ruṣṭo bhaviṣyati
GR13malinivu:1612: 15.22ab: vatsarais tu tribhir divyaṃ gandham āsādya yogavit
GR13malinivu:1614: 15.23ab: sarvam anyad yathoddiṣṭaṃ tathaiva ca vicintayet
GR13malinivu:1619: 15.25cd: na bhetavyaṃ mahādevi na cābhyāsaṃ parityajet
GR13malinivu:1620: 15.26ab: saṃtyajann andhatām eti tena yatnāt samabhyaset
GR13malinivu:1624: 15.28ab: vatsarais tu tribhir yogī brahmāṇḍāntaṃ prapaśyati
GR13malinivu:1626: 15.29ab: svadehādikam anyac ca pūrvoktaṃ pūrvavat smaran
GR13malinivu:1629: 15.30cd: śastrair api na māsena chettuṃ śakyo bhaviṣyati
GR13malinivu:1632: 15.32ab: pīḍyate na kadā cit syād ajarāmaratāṃ gataḥ
GR13malinivu:1635: 15.33cd: kiṃ tv atra cintayed dehaṃ svadehādibhir āvṛtam
GR13malinivu:1645: 15.38cd: tasmāt tad abhyasen mantrī yadīcchen mokṣam akṣayam
GR13malinivu:1648: 15.40ab: akasmāt paśyate kiṃ cid akasmāc chṛṇute tathā
GR13malinivu:1649: 15.40cd: sarvendriyātmakaṃ jñānaṃ akasmāc ca kva cit kva cit
GR13malinivu:1654: 15.43ab: ity ekādaśa gītāni samabhyasyāni te tathā
GR13malinivu:1655: 15.43cd: indriyāṇi yataḥ sarvaṃ phalam eṣu pratiṣṭhitam

GR13malinivu:2203: 20.17ab: tatra cetaḥ sthirīkurvaṃs tad eva sakalaṃ labhet
GR13malinivu:2204: 20.17cd: tena tatra na kurvīta caitad uttamavāñchayā
GR13malinivu:2213: 20.22ab: tena sārūpyam ity uktā rūpasthaṃ yat tadānvitam
GR13malinivu:2217: 20.24ab: cetaḥ śuddham avāpnoti rūpātītaṃ paraṃ padam
GR13malinivu:2220: 20.25cd: caturthāt tu tanuṃ vyaktvā tatkṣaṇād apavṛjyate
GR13malinivu:2226: 20.28cd: dīptibhis tasya tīvrābhir ā brahmabhuvanaṃ tataḥ
GR13malinivu:2227: 20.29ab: evaṃ saṃsmaratas tasya divasaiḥ saptabhiḥ priye
GR13malinivu:2230: 20.30cd: mahāhāsyaṃ tathā geyaṃ śivaruditam eva ca
GR13malinivu:2231: 20.31ab: karoty āviṣṭacittas tu na tu jānāti kiṃ cana
GR13malinivu:2233: 20.32ab: tatra tatra diśaḥ sarvā īkṣate kiraṇākulāḥ
GR13malinivu:2234: 20.32cd: yāṃ yām eva diśaṃ ṣaḍbhir māsair yuktas tu vīkṣate
GR13malinivu:2236: 20.33cd: na teṣu saṃdadhec cetaḥ na cābhyāsaṃ parityajet
GR13malinivu:2237: 20.34ab: kurvann etadvidhaṃ yogī bhīrur unmattako bhavet
GR13malinivu:2238: 20.34cd: vīraḥ śaktim punar yāti pramādāt tadgato 'pi san
GR13malinivu:2242: 20.36cd: navātmānam api dhyāyed ratiśekharam eva vā
GR13malinivu:2250: 20.40cd: aṣṭārasyāthavā devi tasya tredhā śatasya vā
GR13malinivu:2251: 20.41ab: ṣaḍarasyāthavā mantrī yathā sarvaṃ tathā śṛṇu
GR13malinivu:2255: 20.43ab: dakṣaś caṇḍo haraḥ śauṇḍī pramatho bhīmamanmathau
GR13malinivu:2257: 20.44ab: nandā bhadrā jayā kālī karālī vikṛtānanā
GR13malinivu:2261: 20.46ab: siddhir ṛddhis tathā lakṣmīr dīptir mālā śikhā śivā
GR13malinivu:2263: 20.47ab: viśveśī ca sumākhyā ca etā vā dvādaśa kramāt
GR13malinivu:2267: 20.49ab: argheśo bhārabhūtiś ca sthitiḥ sthāṇur haras tathā
GR13malinivu:2270: 20.50cd: siddhir ṛddhir dyutir lakṣmī meghā kāntiḥ svadhā dhṛtiḥ
GR13malinivu:2271: 20.51ab: dīptiḥ puṣṭir matiḥ kīrtiḥ saṃsthitiḥ sugatiḥ smṛtiḥ
GR13malinivu:2275: 20.53ab: māheśyādyās tathā devi caturviṃśaty ataḥ śṛṇu
GR13malinivu:2276: 20.53cd: nandādikāḥ kramāt sarvā brahmāṇyādyās tathaiva ca
GR13malinivu:2277: 20.54ab: saṃvarto lakulīkaś ca bhṛguḥ śveto bakas tathā
GR13malinivu:2278: 20.54cd: khaḍgī pinākī bhujago navamo balir eva ca
GR13malinivu:2279: 20.55ab: mahākālo dviraṇḍaś ca cchagalāṇḍaḥ śikhī tathā
GR13malinivu:2285: 20.58ab: juṃkāro 'tha tathā svāhā ṣaḍare ṣaṭ krameṇa tu
GR13malinivu:2286: 20.58cd: baliś ca balinandaś ca daśagrīvo haro hayaḥ
GR13malinivu:2289: 20.60ab: ambā gurveti yoginyo bījais tair eva ṣaṭ smṛtāḥ
GR13malinivu:2294: 20.62cd: mantraṃ vā pūrvam uddiṣṭaṃ japan dhyāyan prasiddhyati
GR13malinivu:2302: 21.2cd: svarūpeṇa parāṃ tatra sravantīm amṛtaṃ smaret
GR13malinivu:2304: 21.3cd: tatas tu rasanāṃ nītvā lambake viniyojayat
GR13malinivu:2306: 21.4cd: mukham āpūryate tasya kiṃ cil lavaṇavāriṇā
GR13malinivu:2307: 21.5ab: lohagandhena tac cātra na pibet kiṃ tu nikṣipet
GR13malinivu:2308: 21.5cd: evaṃ samabhyaset tāvad yāvat tat svādu jāyate
GR13malinivu:2310: 21.6cd: ṣaḍbhir māsair anāyāsād vatsarān mṛtyujid bhavet
GR13malinivu:2312: 21.7cd: yad eva cintayed dravyaṃ tenāsyāpūryate mukham
GR13malinivu:2313: 21.8ab: rudhiraṃ madiraṃ vātha vasāṃ vā kṣīram eva vā
GR13malinivu:2319: 21.11ab: svādākṛṣṭividhiṃ yāvad guḍe nimbe ca kārayet
GR13malinivu:2322: 21.12cd: nyāsaṃ kṛtvāpi tatrāpi vedhaṃ kuryāc chanaiḥ śanaiḥ
GR13malinivu:2326: 21.14cd: calate pratimā sā tu dhāvate cāpi saṃmukhī
GR13malinivu:2327: 21.15ab: punas tāṃ prerayet tāvad yāvat svasthānam āgatam
GR13malinivu:2328: 21.15cd: patitāṃ cālayed bhūya uttānāṃ pārśvataḥ sthitaḥ
GR13malinivu:2329: 21.16ab: evaṃ sarvātmanas tāvad yāvat svavaśatāṃ gatām
GR13malinivu:2330: 21.16cd: tataḥ prabhṛty asau yogī praviśed yatra rocate
GR13malinivu:2333: 21.18ab: pratyaṅgam aṅgatas tasya śaktiṃ tenākramed budhaḥ
GR13malinivu:2334: 21.18cd: svakīyaṃ rakṣayed deham ākrāntāv anyathā tyajet
GR13malinivu:2345: 21.24ab: tāvad ālokayec candraṃ yāvad astam upāgatam
GR13malinivu:2347: 21.25ab: evaṃ dine dine kuryād yāvat pañcadaśī bhavet
GR13malinivu:2356: 21.29cd: candrabimbe parāṃ devīṃ īkṣate nātra saṃśayaḥ
GR13malinivu:2357: 21.30ab: tatas tāṃ cetasā vyāpya tāvad ākarṣayet sudhīḥ
GR13malinivu:2358: 21.30cd: yāvan mukhāgram āyātā tatra kuryāt sthiraṃ manaḥ
GR13malinivu:2360: 21.31cd: nigiret tāṃ samākṛṣya bhūyo hṛdi vicintayet
GR13malinivu:2367: 21.35ab: athavā tan na śaknoti gagane paricintitum
GR13malinivu:2369: 21.36ab: tat pītvāḷmanasā śeṣāṃ svaped rātrim anusmaran
GR13malinivu:2374: 22.1ab: athānyaṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ kathayāmi tava priye
GR13malinivu:2375: 22.1cd: yan na kasya cid ākhyātaṃ yogāmṛtam anuttamam
GR13malinivu:2387: 22.7cd: aṣṭāraṃ cintayed bimbe śeṣaṃ raśmiṣu cintayet
GR13malinivu:2393: 22.10cd: saṃdhāya tatra caitanyaṃ tiṣṭhed yāvan na paśyati
GR13malinivu:2394: 22.11ab: naṣṭe 'pi cetasā śeṣaṃ tiṣṭhet kālam anusmaran
GR13malinivu:2395: 22.11cd: evaṃ māsena deveśi sthiraṃ tad upajāyate
GR13malinivu:2401: 22.14cd: āpīya pūrvavat paścād vṛttiṃ niścalatāṃ nayet
GR13malinivu:2403: 22.15cd: yāvat tiṣṭhati deveśi tāvat saṃtyajati kṣitim
GR13malinivu:2407: 22.17cd: bhuktvā tu vipulān bhogān niṣkale līyate pare
GR13malinivu:2408: 22.18ab: tad etat khecarīcakraṃ yatra khecaratāṃ vrajet
GR13malinivu:2411: 22.19cd: dehaṃ cintayataḥ pūrvaṃ phalaṃ syān niścitātmanaḥ
GR13malinivu:2413: 22.20cd: viśrāmya mastake cittaṃ kṣaṇam ekaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ
GR13malinivu:2415: 22.21cd: evaṃ samabhyasan māsāc cakravad bhramati kṣitau
GR13malinivu:2416: 22.22ab: muhūrtaṃ spṛśate bhūmiṃ muhūrtāc ca nabhastalam
GR13malinivu:2423: 22.25cd: paśyatām eva lokānāṃ tejobhir bhāsayan diśaḥ
GR13malinivu:2424: 22.26ab: yāty utkṛṣya mahīpṛṣṭhāt khecarīṇāṃ patir bhavet
GR13malinivu:2429: 22.28cd: bhruvor madhye samādhāya kṣaṇaṃ cetaḥ prapaśyati
GR13malinivu:2431: 22.29cd: prayogaṃ tv eva satataṃ yogayuktaḥ samabhyaset
GR13malinivu:2433: 22.30cd: dvābhyāṃ bahiḥ sthitaṃ sarvaṃ tribhiḥ pattanasaṃsthitam
GR13malinivu:2435: 22.31cd: ṣaḍbhir māsair mahāyogī cchidraṃ paśyati medinīm
GR13malinivu:2441: 22.34cd: tenāpi sarvaṃ purvoktaṃ vyāpnoti phalam uttamam
GR13malinivu:2449: 23.3ab: tatas tatra śṛṇoty eṣa yogī dhvanim anāvṛtam
GR13malinivu:2457: 23.7ab: athavā grahaṇe māsi kṛtvā sūryaṃ tu pṛṣṭhataḥ
GR13malinivu:2461: 23.9ab: yāti tanmayatāṃ tatra yogayukto yathā yathā
GR13malinivu:2468: 23.12cd: abdaṃ divyatanur bhūtvā śivavan modate ciram
GR13malinivu:2470: 23.13cd: hrīṃ kṣlāṃ kṣvīṃ vaṃ tathāḷkṣaṃ ca pañcakasya yathākramam
GR13malinivu:2471: 23.14ab: haṃ yaṃ raṃ laṃ tathā vaṃ ca pañcakasyāparasya ca
GR13malinivu:2472: 23.14cd: ṛṃ .Rṃ ḷṃ .Lṃ tathā oṃ auṃ haḥ aṃ ākarṇikāvadhau
GR13malinivu:2473: 23.15ab: kesareṣu bhakārāntā haṃ hāṃ hiṃ hīṃ ca huṃ tathā
GR13malinivu:2474: 23.15cd: hūṃ heṃ haiṃ ca daleṣv evaṃ svasaṃjñābhiś ca śaktayaḥ
GR13malinivu:2478: 23.17cd: namaḥ svāhā tathā vauṣaṭ huṃ vaṣaṭ phaṭ ca
GR13malinivu:2487: 23.21cd: tadvad guhyaṃ ca kurvīta vidyeyaṃ dvyakṣarā matā
GR13malinivu:2490: 23.23ab: tat pradeśaṃ samāsādya mantrair ātmānam ādarāt
GR13malinivu:2493: 23.24cd: tatas tatra kva cit kṣetre yoginyo bhīmavikramāḥ
GR13malinivu:2497: 23.26cd: athavā kṛtasevas tu lakṣam ekaṃ japet sudhīḥ
GR13malinivu:2503: 23.29cd: kṣaṇād ananyacittas tu kṣobhayed urvaśīm api
GR13malinivu:2512: 23.34ab: hṛccakre tanmayo bhūtvā rātrau rātrāv ananyadhīḥ
GR13malinivu:2513: 23.34cd: māsād ūrdhvaṃ mahādevi svapne yat kiṃcid īkṣate
GR13malinivu:2514: 23.35ab: tat tathyaṃ jāyate tasya dhyānayuktasya yoginaḥ
GR13malinivu:2515: 23.35cd: tatraiva yadi kālasya niyamena rato bhavet
GR13malinivu:2520: 23.38ab: kva cit kārye samutpanne suptajñānam upākramet
GR13malinivu:2523: 23.39cd: ya evaṃ tattvato veda sa śivo nātra saṃśayaḥ
GR13malinivu:2525: 23.40cd: etac chrutvā mahādevī paraṃ saṃtoṣam āgatā
GR13malinivu:2526: 23.41ab: evaṃ kṣamāpayām āsa praṇipatya punaḥ punaḥ
GR13malinivu:2529: 23.42cd: bhavadbhir api nākhyeyam aśiṣyāṇām idaṃ mahat
GR13malinivu:2534: 23.45ab: manayo yogam abhyasya parāṃ siddhim upāgatāḥ
